channel.title: Twitter on Adam Israel
channel.description: Recent content in Twitter on Adam Israel

item.title: Twittertrope
item.description: I was updating my submission tracker on Duotrope this morning, after receiving a rejection from Writers of the Future. I was tweeting about the rejection when I had a slight epiphany. I realized how cool it would be if Duotrope had Twitter integration. They don’t, and as I discovered, neither do they have any presence on Twitter. I decided then and there that something must be done to correct this oversight.
